name: Blazing Margherita
description: A fiery twist on a classic! Hand-stretched dough meets zesty tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella, and fresh basil, kissed by our wood-fired oven’s smoky embrace.

name: Spicy Inferno Pepperoni
description: Ignite your taste buds with spicy pepperoni, gooey mozzarella, and a hint of chili oil, all baked to a crispy perfection in our roaring oven.

name: Truffle Ecstasy
description: Indulge in luxury with truffle oil, earthy wild mushrooms, peppery arugula, and shaved parmesan, slow-roasted for a flavor explosion.

name: Garden Blaze Veggie
description: A vibrant medley of roasted bell peppers, black olives, caramelized onions, and spinach, bursting with fresh-from-the-garden goodness.

name: Garlic Fire Sticks
description: Crispy breadsticks drenched in garlic butter and herbs, served with a smoky marinara dip—perfect for sharing or devouring solo!

name: Zesty Mint Splash
description: A refreshing blast of hand-squeezed lemonade with a cool mint twist, crafted to complement your pizza adventure.

name: Chocolate Lava Delight
description: A molten chocolate lava cake with a gooey center, served warm with a scoop of vanilla gelato—pure indulgence after your pizza feast!

name: Spiced Iced Chai
description: A bold blend of spiced chai with a hint of cinnamon, served over ice to cool down after the heat of our wood-fired pizzas.
